These_DT securities_NNS are_VBP attractive_JJ to_TO Japanese_JJ investors_NNS for_IN three_CD reasons_NNS ._.
First_LS ,_, they_PRP are_VBP safe_JJ ._.
While_IN they_PRP are_VBP n't_RB backed_VBN by_IN the_DT full_JJ faith_NN and_CC credit_NN of_IN the_DT U.S._NNP government_NN ,_, as_IN Treasury_NNP bonds_NNS are_VBP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ widely_RB assumed_VBN that_IN the_DT government_NN would_MD support_VB them_PRP if_IN necessary_JJ ._.

But_CC there_EX is_VBZ a_DT risk_NN ,_, which_WDT the_DT Japanese_NNPS discovered_VBD when_WRB they_PRP first_RB dipped_VBD their_PRP$ toes_NNS into_IN the_DT market_NN nearly_RB five_CD years_NNS ago_RB ._.
Since_IN most_JJS mortgages_NNS can_MD be_VB prepaid_VBN or_CC refinanced_VBN at_IN any_DT time_NN ,_, issuers_NNS of_IN mortgage_NN securities_NNS retain_VBP the_DT right_NN to_TO buy_VB back_RB their_PRP$ bonds_NNS before_IN maturity_NN ._.
That_DT 's_VBZ a_DT headache_NN for_IN long-term_JJ investors_NNS ,_, since_IN it_PRP forces_VBZ them_PRP to_TO reinvest_VB their_PRP$ money_NN --_: usually_RB at_IN lower_JJR rates_NNS than_IN the_DT original_JJ mortgage_NN securities_NNS carried_VBD ._.
``_`` Two_CD or_CC three_CD years_NNS ago_RB ,_, the_DT problem_NN was_VBD that_IN people_NNS did_VBD n't_RB understand_VB the_DT prepayment_NN risk_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Nomura_NN 's_POS Mr._NNP Kato_NNP ._.
``_`` So_RB they_PRP were_VBD surprised_JJ and_CC very_RB disappointed_JJ by_IN prepayment_NN ._. ''_''
Compounding_VBG the_DT trouble_NN to_TO Japanese_JJ investors_NNS ,_, mortgage_NN securities_NNS pay_VBP interest_NN monthly_RB ,_, since_IN most_JJS mortgages_NNS require_VBP homeowners_NNS to_TO make_VB monthly_JJ payments_NNS ._.
But_CC Japanese_JJ institutional_JJ investors_NNS are_VBP used_VBN to_TO quarterly_JJ or_CC semiannual_JJ payments_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ investments_NNS ,_, so_IN the_DT monthly_JJ cash_NN flow_NN posed_VBD administrative_JJ problems_NNS ._.
As_IN a_DT result_NN ,_, Japanese_JJ investors_NNS steered_VBD clear_RB of_IN the_DT mortgage_NN securities_NNS ._.
But_CC they_PRP did_VBD n't_RB lose_VB touch_NN with_IN the_DT U.S._NNP issuers_NNS ._.

And_CC Japanese_JJ investors_NNS took_VBD up_RP nearly_RB all_DT of_IN two_CD $_$ 200_CD million_CD Real_JJ Estate_NNP Mortgage_NNP Investment_NNP Conduits_NNS ,_, a_DT kind_NN of_IN collateralized_JJ mortgage_NN obligation_NN ,_, that_WDT were_VBD offered_VBN to_TO foreigners_NNS this_DT year_NN ._.
In_IN addition_NN ,_, further_JJ packaging_NN of_IN mortgage-backed_JJ securities_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN Blackstone_VBP 's_POS fund_NN ,_, have_VB reduced_VBN the_DT effects_NNS of_IN prepayment_NN risk_NN and_CC automatically_RB reinvest_VB monthly_JJ payments_NNS so_IN institutions_NNS do_VBP n't_RB have_VB to_TO ._.
Freddie_NNP Mac_NNP for_IN years_NNS has_VBZ offered_VBN a_DT so-called_JJ participation_NN certificate_NN that_WDT guarantees_VBZ it_PRP wo_MD n't_RB be_VB prepaid_VBN for_IN a_DT set_NN number_NN of_IN years_NNS and_CC offers_VBZ semiannual_JJ payments_NNS ._.
As_IN Georgia-Pacific_NNP 's_POS bid_NN for_IN Great_NNP Northern_NNP Nekoosa_NNP has_VBZ shown_VBN ,_, uninvited_JJ takeovers_NNS are_VBP still_RB alive_JJ despite_IN premature_JJ reports_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ demise_NN ._.
Therefore_RB ,_, the_DT debate_NN about_IN poison_NN pills_NNS will_MD continue_VB to_TO rage_VB in_IN the_DT boardrooms_NNS of_IN corporations_NNS and_CC the_DT halls_NNS of_IN academia_NN ._.
Although_IN poison_NN pills_NNS come_VBP in_IN different_JJ colors_NNS and_CC shapes_NNS ,_, they_PRP usually_RB give_VBP current_JJ shareholders_NNS the_DT right_NN to_TO buy_VB more_JJR stock_NN of_IN their_PRP$ corporation_NN at_IN a_DT large_JJ discount_NN if_IN certain_JJ events_NNS occur_VBP --_: typically_RB ,_, if_IN a_DT hostile_JJ bidder_NN acquires_VBZ more_JJR than_IN a_DT specified_JJ percentage_NN of_IN the_DT corporation_NN 's_POS stock_NN ._.
However_RB ,_, these_DT discount_NN purchase_NN rights_NNS may_MD generally_RB be_VB redeemed_VBN at_IN a_DT nominal_JJ cost_NN by_IN the_DT corporation_NN 's_POS directors_NNS if_IN they_PRP approve_VBP of_IN a_DT bidder_NN ._.
Supporters_NNS of_IN poison_NN pills_NNS argue_VBP that_DT their_PRP$ adoption_NN forces_VBZ bidders_NNS to_TO negotiate_VB with_IN a_DT corporation_NN 's_POS directors_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP thereby_RB put_VBN in_IN a_DT better_JJR position_NN to_TO pursue_VB the_DT long-term_JJ interests_NNS of_IN the_DT corporation_NN ._.
Recent_JJ studies_NNS by_IN Georgeson_NNP &_CC Co._NNP conclude_VBP that_IN corporations_NNS with_IN poison_NN pills_NNS have_VBP experienced_VBN greater_JJR stock-price_JJ appreciation_NN than_IN corporations_NNS without_IN poison_NN pills_NNS during_IN the_DT past_JJ few_JJ years_NNS ._.
Critics_NNS of_IN poison_NN pills_NNS argue_VBP that_IN they_PRP harm_VBP shareholders_NNS by_IN letting_VBG corporate_JJ management_NN defeat_VB takeover_NN bids_NNS at_IN premium_JJ prices_NNS and_CC by_IN deterring_VBG premium_JJ bids_NNS from_IN ever_RB being_VBG made_VBN to_TO shareholders_NNS ._.

A_DT governing_VBG body_NN of_IN both_CC the_DT Financial_NNP Accounting_NNP Standards_NNP Board_NNP and_CC the_DT Governmental_NNP Accounting_NNP Standards_NNP Board_NNP voted_VBD to_TO give_VB the_DT FASB_NNP jurisdiction_NN over_IN accounting_NN standards_NNS for_IN certain_JJ government-owned_JJ entities_NNS ._.
The_DT Financial_NNP Accounting_NNP Foundation_NNP voted_VBD 12-2_RB that_DT FASB_NNP accounting_NN rules_NNS supercede_VBP GASB_NNP rules_NNS in_IN regard_NN to_TO utilities_NNS ,_, hospitals_NNS ,_, and_CC colleges_NNS and_CC universities_NNS owned_VBN by_IN the_DT government_NN ._.
GASB_NNP rules_NNS still_RB apply_VBP for_IN other_JJ government_NN units_NNS ._.
After_IN the_DT GASB_NNP was_VBD founded_VBN in_IN 1984_CD ,_, 11_CD years_NNS after_IN the_DT FASB_NNP ,_, the_DT government-owned_JJ entities_NNS were_VBD supposed_VBN to_TO follow_VB FASB_NNP rules_NNS unless_IN the_DT GASB_NNP superceded_VBD them_PRP ._.

The_DT foundation_NN vote_NN is_VBZ effective_JJ for_IN the_DT affected_JJ government_NN entities_NNS with_IN fiscal_JJ years_NNS that_WDT begin_VBP starting_VBG next_JJ Jan._NNP 1_CD and_CC makes_VBZ the_DT financial_JJ results_NNS of_IN the_DT hospitals_NNS ,_, colleges_NNS and_CC schools_NNS easier_JJR to_TO compare_VB with_IN for-profit_JJ businesses_NNS ._.

To_TO me_PRP ,_, this_DT calls_VBZ into_IN question_NN the_DT validity_NN of_IN the_DT Rowland-Molina_NNP theory_NN and_CC hence_RB the_DT whole_JJ chlorofluorocarbons_NNS replacement_NN effort_NN ._.

Due_JJ to_TO the_DT Treasury_NNP 's_POS need_NN to_TO raise_VB funds_NNS quickly_RB before_IN the_DT current_JJ authority_NN to_TO issue_VB debt_NN expires_VBZ at_IN midnight_NN tonight_NN ,_, yesterday_NN 's_POS auction_NN was_VBD structured_VBN differently_RB from_IN previous_JJ sales_NNS ._.

And_CC because_IN of_IN the_DT early_JJ settlement_NN ,_, the_DT three-month_JJ bills_NNS actually_RB have_VBP a_DT 93-day_JJ maturity_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT six-month_JJ bills_NNS have_VBP an_DT 184-day_JJ maturity_NN ._.

Here_RB are_VBP details_NNS of_IN yesterday_NN 's_POS three-month_JJ and_CC six-month_JJ bill_NN auction_NN :_:
Rates_NNS are_VBP determined_VBN by_IN the_DT difference_NN between_IN the_DT purchase_NN price_NN and_CC face_NN value_NN ._.
Thus_RB ,_, higher_JJR bidding_NN narrows_VBZ the_DT investor_NN 's_POS return_NN while_IN lower_JJR bidding_NN widens_VBZ it_PRP ._.
The_DT percentage_NN rates_NNS are_VBP calculated_VBN on_IN a_DT 360-day_JJ year_NN ,_, while_IN the_DT coupon_NN equivalent_JJ yield_NN is_VBZ based_VBN on_IN a_DT 365-day_JJ year_NN ._.

``_`` And_CC where_WRB we_PRP are_VBP is_VBZ bad_JJ ._. ''_''
Despite_IN valiant_JJ efforts_NNS by_IN Finance_NNP Minister_NNP Mailson_NNP Ferreira_NNP da_NNP Nobrega_NNP ,_, inflation_NN came_VBD to_TO 36_CD %_NN in_IN September_NNP alone_RB and_CC is_VBZ expected_VBN to_TO top_VB 1,000_CD %_NN for_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
That_DT might_MD have_VB been_VBN considered_VBN hyperinflation_NN not_RB long_RB ago_RB ,_, but_CC Argentina_NNP endured_VBD price_NN increases_NNS of_IN almost_RB 200_CD %_NN in_IN July_NNP before_IN bringing_VBG the_DT rate_NN down_RP sharply_RB in_IN August_NNP and_CC September_NNP ._.

For_IN instance_NN ,_, juries_NNS would_MD have_VB to_TO consider_VB specific_JJ ``_`` aggravating_JJ ''_'' and_CC ``_`` mitigating_JJ ''_'' factors_NNS before_IN deciding_VBG whether_IN to_TO condemn_VB someone_NN to_TO death_NN ._.
Since_IN that_DT 1976_CD ruling_NN ,_, 37_CD states_NNS have_VBP reintroduced_VBN the_DT death_NN penalty_NN ._.

The_DT Thurmond_NNP bill_NN would_MD establish_VB a_DT federally_RB administered_VBN death_NN sentence_NN for_IN 23_CD crimes_NNS ,_, most_JJS of_IN which_WDT were_VBD formerly_RB punishable_JJ by_IN death_NN under_IN federal_JJ statutes_NNS that_IN the_DT Supreme_NNP Court_NNP invalidated_VBD ._.

Revco_NNP D.S._NNP Inc._NNP ,_, the_DT drugstore_NN chain_NN that_WDT filed_VBD for_IN bankruptcy-court_NN protection_NN last_JJ year_NN ,_, received_VBD a_DT $_$ 925_CD million_CD offer_NN from_IN a_DT group_NN led_VBD by_IN Texas_NNP billionaire_NN Robert_NNP Bass_NNP ._.

``_`` Demand_NN from_IN Japan_NNP is_VBZ expected_VBN to_TO continue_VB strong_JJ ,_, but_CC not_RB from_IN other_JJ areas_NNS of_IN the_DT world_NN into_IN the_DT first_JJ quarter_NN of_IN next_JJ year_NN ,_, ''_'' he_PRP said_VBD ._.

However_RB ,_, traders_NNS disregarded_VBD a_DT potential_JJ production_NN disruption_NN in_IN Chile_NNP and_CC a_DT continued_VBN drop_NN in_IN inventories_NNS ._.

In_IN other_JJ commodity_NN markets_NNS yesterday_NN :_:

The_DT prices_NNS of_IN most_JJS corn_NN ,_, soybean_NN and_CC wheat_NN futures_NNS contracts_NNS dropped_VBD slightly_RB as_IN farmers_NNS in_IN the_DT Midwest_NNP continued_VBN to_TO rebuild_VB stockpiles_NNS that_WDT were_VBD depleted_VBN by_IN the_DT 1988_CD drought_NN ._.

COFFEE_NN :_:

According_VBG to_TO one_CD analyst_NN ,_, prices_NNS opened_VBD higher_RBR because_IN of_IN reports_NNS over_IN the_DT weekend_NN that_IN Brazil_NNP and_CC Colombia_NNP ,_, at_IN the_DT Pan-American_JJ summit_NN meeting_NN in_IN Costa_NNP Rica_NNP ,_, had_VBD agreed_VBN to_TO a_DT reduction_NN in_IN their_PRP$ coffee_NN export_NN quotas_NNS for_IN the_DT sake_NN of_IN creating_VBG a_DT new_JJ agreement_NN ._.

''_''

The_DT S&P_NNP 500_CD is_VBZ often_RB used_VBN in_IN arbitrage_NN strategies_NNS ._.
The_DT portion_NN of_IN OTC_NNP volume_NN attributable_JJ to_TO program_NN trading_NN is_VBZ n't_RB known_VBN ,_, as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ on_IN the_DT New_NNP York_NNP Stock_NNP Exchange_NNP ,_, where_WRB it_PRP amounted_VBD to_TO more_JJR than_IN 13_CD %_NN in_IN September_NNP ._.
Estimates_NNS from_IN traders_NNS put_VBD it_PRP at_IN less_JJR than_IN 5_CD %_NN of_IN Nasdaq_NNP 's_POS average_JJ daily_JJ volume_NN of_IN roughly_RB 133_CD million_CD shares_NNS ._.
Other_JJ market-maker_NN gripes_NNS :_: Program_NN trading_NN also_RB causes_VBZ the_DT Nasdaq_NNP Composite_NNP Index_NNP to_TO lose_VB ground_NN against_IN other_JJ segments_NNS of_IN the_DT stock_NN market_NN ._.
Because_IN of_IN program_NN trading_NN it_PRP is_VBZ more_RBR difficult_JJ to_TO trade_VB many_JJ OTC_NNP stocks_NNS without_IN sharp_JJ price_NN moves_NNS ,_, a_DT condition_NN known_VBN as_IN illiquidity_NN ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, the_DT price_NN volatility_NN that_WDT is_VBZ amplified_VBN by_IN program_NN trading_NN is_VBZ undercutting_VBG efforts_NNS to_TO woo_VB individual_JJ investors_NNS back_RB to_TO an_DT OTC_NNP market_NN that_WDT sorely_RB misses_VBZ them_PRP ._.
Some_DT of_IN these_DT problems_NNS are_VBP neither_DT new_JJ nor_CC unique_JJ to_TO the_DT OTC_NNP market_NN ._.
But_CC the_DT big_JJ ,_, often_RB tumultuous_JJ slide_NN in_IN stock_NN prices_NNS this_DT month_NN has_VBZ turned_VBN some_DT of_IN those_DT who_WP have_VBP been_VBN profiting_VBG from_IN the_DT practice_NN against_IN it_PRP ._.
Peter_NNP DaPuzzo_NNP ,_, head_NN of_IN retail_JJ equity_NN trading_NN at_IN Shearson_NNP Lehman_NNP Hutton_NNP ,_, acknowledges_VBZ that_IN he_PRP was_VBD n't_RB troubled_JJ by_IN program_NN trading_NN when_WRB it_PRP began_VBD in_IN the_DT pre-crash_JJ bull_NN market_NN because_IN it_PRP added_VBD liquidity_NN and_CC people_NNS were_VBD pleased_JJ to_TO see_VB stock_NN prices_NNS rising_NN ._.
``_`` We_PRP were_VBD n't_RB as_RB concerned_VBN until_IN they_PRP became_VBD sell_NN programs_NNS ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Mr._NNP DaPuzzo_NNP ,_, who_WP now_RB thinks_VBZ it_PRP adds_VBZ unnecessary_JJ volatility_NN ._.
Shearson_NNP Lehman_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, executes_VBZ program_NN trades_NNS for_IN clients_NNS ._.
Merrill_NNP Lynch_NNP ,_, Goldman_NNP Sachs_NNP and_CC Kidder_NNP Peabody_NNP ,_, in_IN addition_NN to_TO Shearson_NNP ,_, do_VBP program-trade_JJ OTC_NNP stocks_NNS ._.
Shearson_NNP ,_, Merrill_NNP Lynch_NNP and_CC Goldman_NNP Sachs_NNP say_VBP they_PRP do_VBP so_RB only_RB for_IN customers_NNS ,_, however_RB ._.
Kidder_NNP Peabody_NNP does_VBZ program_NN trading_NN for_IN its_PRP$ own_JJ as_RB well_RB as_IN clients_NNS '_POS accounts_NNS ._.
Of_IN course_NN ,_, there_EX were_VBD sell_NN programs_NNS in_IN past_JJ years_NNS ,_, too_RB ,_, but_CC they_PRP seem_VBP to_TO hurt_VB market_NN makers_NNS more_RBR painfully_RB these_DT days_NNS ._.
That_DT 's_VBZ largely_RB because_IN of_IN defensive_JJ measures_NNS they_PRP adopted_VBD after_IN the_DT 1987_CD crash_NN ,_, when_WRB individual_JJ investors_NNS fled_VBD the_DT market_NN and_CC trading_NN activity_NN dwindled_VBD ._.
Market_NN makers_NNS ,_, to_TO cut_VB costs_NNS ,_, slashed_VBD inventories_NNS of_IN stocks_NNS they_PRP keep_VBP on_IN hand_NN to_TO sell_VB investors_NNS when_WRB other_JJ holders_NNS are_VBP n't_RB selling_VBG ._.

``_`` The_DT reinsurance_NN market_NN has_VBZ been_VBN bloodied_VBN by_IN disasters_NNS ''_'' in_IN the_DT U.S._NNP as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN Great_NNP Britain_NNP and_CC Europe_NNP ,_, says_VBZ Thomas_NNP Rosencrants_NNP ,_, director_NN of_IN research_NN at_IN Interstate\/Johnson_NNP Lane_NNP Inc._NNP in_IN Atlanta_NNP ._.

Insurers_NNP buy_VBP this_DT insurance_NN protection_NN for_IN themselves_PRP by_IN giving_VBG up_RP a_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT premiums_NNS they_PRP collect_VBP on_IN a_DT policy_NN to_TO another_DT firm_NN --_: a_DT reinsurance_NN company_NN ,_, which_WDT ,_, in_IN turn_NN ,_, accepts_VBZ a_DT portion_NN of_IN any_DT losses_NNS resulting_VBG from_IN this_DT policy_NN ._.
Insurers_NNP ,_, such_JJ as_IN Cigna_NNP Corp._NNP ,_, Transamerica_NNP Corp_NNP ,_, and_CC Aetna_NNP Life_NNP &_CC Casualty_NNP Co._NNP ,_, buy_VBP reinsurance_NN from_IN other_JJ U.S.-based_JJ companies_NNS and_CC Lloyd_NNP 's_VBZ of_IN London_NNP for_IN one_CD catastrophe_NN at_IN a_DT time_NN ._.

SHORT-TERM_JJ MUNICIPALS_NNS :_:
Investors_NNS with_IN a_DT heavy_JJ tax_NN load_NN should_MD take_VB out_RP their_PRP$ calculators_NNS ._.
Yields_NNS on_IN municipal_JJ bonds_NNS can_MD be_VB higher_JJR than_IN after-tax_JJ yields_NNS on_IN CDs_NNS for_IN maturities_NNS of_IN perhaps_RB one_CD to_TO five_CD years_NNS ._.
That_DT 's_VBZ because_RB municipal-bond_JJ interest_NN is_VBZ exempt_JJ from_IN federal_JJ income_NN tax_NN --_: and_CC from_IN state_NN and_CC local_JJ taxes_NNS too_RB ,_, for_IN in-state_JJ investors_NNS ._.
For_IN an_DT investor_NN paying_VBG tax_NN at_IN a_DT 33_CD %_NN rate_NN ,_, a_DT seemingly_RB puny_JJ 6_CD %_NN yield_NN on_IN a_DT one-year_JJ muni_NNS is_VBZ equivalent_JJ to_TO a_DT taxable_JJ 9_CD %_NN ._.
Rates_NNS approach_VBP 6.5_CD %_NN on_IN five-year_JJ municipals_NNS ._.
Some_DT of_IN the_DT more_RBR cautious_JJ CD_NNP holders_NNS might_MD like_VB ``_`` pre-refunded_JJ ''_'' municipals_NNS ._.

``_`` It_PRP 's_VBZ a_DT no-brainer_NN :_: You_PRP do_VBP n't_RB have_VB to_TO worry_VB about_IN diversification_NN ;_: you_PRP do_VBP n't_RB have_VB to_TO worry_VB about_IN quality_NN ,_, ''_'' says_VBZ Steven_NNP J._NNP Hueglin_NNP ,_, executive_JJ vice_NN president_NN of_IN the_DT New_NNP York_NNP bond_NN firm_NN of_IN Gabriele_NNP ,_, Hueglin_NNP &_CC Cashman_NNP Inc_NNP ._.
Consider_VB a_DT ``_`` laddered_JJ ''_'' bond_NN portfolio_NN ,_, with_IN issues_NNS maturing_VBG in_IN ,_, say_VB ,_, 1992_CD ,_, 1993_CD and_CC 1994_CD ,_, advises_VBZ Malcolm_NNP A._NN Makin_NNP ,_, a_DT Westerly_NNP ,_, R.I._NNP ,_, financial_JJ planner_NN ._.
The_DT idea_NN is_VBZ to_TO have_VB money_NN rolling_VBG over_RP each_DT year_NN at_IN prevailing_JJ interest_NN rates_NNS ._.
BOND_NN FUNDS_NNS :_:
Bond_NN mutual_JJ funds_NNS offer_VBP diversification_NN and_CC are_VBP easy_JJ to_TO buy_VB and_CC sell_VB ._.
That_DT makes_VBZ them_PRP a_DT reasonable_JJ option_NN for_IN investors_NNS who_WP will_MD accept_VB some_DT risk_NN of_IN price_NN fluctuation_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO make_VB a_DT bet_NN that_IN interest_NN rates_NNS will_MD decline_VB over_IN the_DT next_JJ year_NN or_CC so_RB ._.
Buyers_NNS can_MD look_VB forward_RP to_TO double-digit_JJ annual_JJ returns_NNS if_IN they_PRP are_VBP right_JJ ._.
But_CC they_PRP will_MD have_VB disappointing_JJ returns_NNS or_CC even_JJ losses_NNS if_IN interest_NN rates_NNS rise_VBP instead_RB ._.
Bond_NN resale_NN prices_NNS ,_, and_CC thus_RB fund_NN share_NN prices_NNS ,_, move_VBP in_IN the_DT opposite_JJ direction_NN from_IN rates_NNS ._.
The_DT price_NN movements_NNS get_VB bigger_JJR as_IN the_DT maturity_NN of_IN the_DT securities_NNS lengthens_VBZ ._.
Consider_VB ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, two_CD bond_NN funds_NNS from_IN Vanguard_NNP Group_NNP of_IN Investment_NNP Cos._NNP that_WDT were_VBD both_DT yielding_VBG 8.6_CD %_NN on_IN a_DT recent_JJ day_NN ._.
The_DT Short_NNP Term_NNP Bond_NNP Fund_NNP ,_, with_IN an_DT average_JJ maturity_NN of_IN 2_CD 1\/2_CD years_NNS ,_, would_MD deliver_VB a_DT total_JJ return_NN for_IN one_CD year_NN of_IN about_RB 10.6_CD %_NN if_IN rates_NNS drop_VBP one_CD percentage_NN point_NN and_CC a_DT one-year_JJ return_NN of_IN about_RB 6.6_CD %_NN if_IN rates_NNS rise_VBP by_IN the_DT same_JJ amount_NN ._.
But_CC ,_, in_IN the_DT same_JJ circumstances_NNS ,_, the_DT returns_NNS would_MD be_VB a_DT more_RBR extreme_JJ 14.6_CD %_NN and_CC 2.6_CD %_NN for_IN the_DT Vanguard_NNP Bond_NNP Market_NNP Fund_NNP ,_, with_IN its_PRP$ 12_CD 1\/2-year_JJ average_JJ maturity_NN ._.
``_`` You_PRP get_VB equity-like_JJ returns_NNS ''_'' from_IN bonds_NNS if_IN you_PRP guess_VB right_RB on_IN rates_NNS ,_, says_VBZ James_NNP E._NNP Wilson_NNP ,_, a_DT Columbia_NNP ,_, S.C._NNP ,_, planner_NN ._.
If_IN interest_NN rates_NNS do_VBP n't_RB change_VB ,_, bond_NN fund_NN investors_NNS '_POS returns_NNS will_MD be_VB about_RB equal_JJ to_TO the_DT funds_NNS '_POS current_JJ yields_NNS ._.
DEFERRED_JJ ANNUITIES_NNS :_:
These_DT insurance_NN company_NN contracts_NNS feature_VBP some_DT of_IN the_DT same_JJ tax_NN benefits_NNS and_CC restrictions_NNS as_IN non-deductible_JJ individual_JJ retirement_NN accounts_NNS :_: Investment_NN gains_NNS are_VBP compounded_VBN without_IN tax_NN consequences_NNS until_IN money_NN is_VBZ withdrawn_VBN ,_, but_CC a_DT 10_CD %_NN penalty_NN tax_NN is_VBZ imposed_VBN on_IN withdrawals_NNS made_VBN before_IN age_NN 59_CD 1\/2_CD ._.
Aimed_VBN specifically_RB at_IN CD_NNP holders_NNS are_VBP so-called_JJ CD-type_JJ annuities_NNS ,_, or_CC certificates_NNS of_IN annuity_NN ._.
An_DT interest_NN rate_NN is_VBZ guaranteed_VBN for_IN between_IN one_CD and_CC seven_CD years_NNS ,_, after_IN which_WDT holders_NNS get_VBP 30_CD days_NNS to_TO choose_VB another_DT guarantee_NN period_NN or_CC to_TO switch_VB to_TO another_DT insurer_NN 's_POS contract_NN without_IN the_DT surrender_NN charges_NNS that_WDT are_VBP common_JJ to_TO annuities_NNS ._.
Some_DT current_JJ rates_NNS exceed_VBP those_DT on_IN CDs_NNS ._.

MONEY_NN MARKET_NN FUNDS_NNS :_:
That_DT 's_VBZ right_JJ ,_, money_NN market_NN mutual_JJ funds_NNS ._.
The_DT conventional_JJ wisdom_NN is_VBZ to_TO go_VB into_IN money_NN funds_NNS when_WRB rates_NNS are_VBP rising_VBG and_CC shift_VB out_RB at_IN times_NNS such_JJ as_IN the_DT present_NN ,_, when_WRB rates_NNS seem_VBP headed_VBN down_RB ._.
With_IN average_JJ maturities_NNS of_IN a_DT month_NN or_CC so_RB ,_, money_NN funds_NNS offer_VBP fixed_JJ share_NN prices_NNS and_CC floating_VBG returns_NNS that_IN track_VBP market_NN interest_NN rates_NNS ,_, with_IN a_DT slight_JJ lag_NN ._.
Still_RB ,_, today_NN 's_POS highest-yielding_JJ money_NN funds_NNS may_MD beat_VB CDs_NNS over_IN the_DT next_JJ year_NN even_RB if_IN rates_NNS fall_VBP ,_, says_VBZ Guy_NNP Witman_NNP ,_, an_DT editor_NN of_IN the_DT Bond_NNP Market_NNP Advisor_NNP newsletter_NN in_IN Atlanta_NNP ._.

Step_NN 1_CD cleans_VBZ up_RP our_PRP$ books_NNS ._.
Our_PRP$ five-year_JJ plan_NN contains_VBZ three_CD accounting_NN devices_NNS --_: negative_JJ money_NN ,_, an_DT above_JJ guidance_NN management_NN reserve_NN and_CC optimistic_JJ inflation_NN estimates_NNS --_: which_WDT understate_VBP the_DT spending_NN the_DT Pentagon_NNP has_VBZ committed_VBN itself_PRP to_TO by_IN almost_RB $_$ 100_CD billion_CD ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ known_VBN in_IN the_DT Pentagon_NNP as_IN the_DT ``_`` negative_JJ wedge_NN ._. ''_''
The_DT Pentagon_NNP argues_VBZ that_IN the_DT negative_JJ wedge_NN is_VBZ the_DT net_JJ effect_NN of_IN $_$ 22_CD billion_CD in_IN the_DT as-yet_RB unidentified_JJ procurement_NN reductions_NNS that_WDT it_PRP intends_VBZ to_TO find_VB in_IN future_JJ years_NNS and_CC $_$ 23_CD billion_CD in_IN an_DT ``_`` above_JJ guidance_NN ''_'' management_NN reserve_NN that_WDT accounts_VBZ for_IN undefined_JJ programs_NNS that_WDT will_MD materialize_VB in_IN the_DT future_NN ._.
The_DT 1990_CD plan_NN also_RB assumes_VBZ inflation_NN will_MD decline_VB to_TO 1.7_CD %_NN by_IN 1994_CD ._.
Most_JJS forecasters_NNS ,_, including_VBG those_DT in_IN the_DT Congressional_NNP Budget_NNP Office_NNP ,_, assume_VBP inflation_NN will_MD be_VB in_IN excess_NN of_IN 4_CD %_NN in_IN each_DT of_IN those_DT five_CD years_NNS ._.

By_IN adding_VBG the_DT negative_JJ wedge_NN and_CC recalculating_VBG the_DT remaining_VBG program_NN using_VBG a_DT more_RBR probable_JJ inflation_NN estimate_NN ,_, we_PRP arrive_VBP at_IN a_DT baseline_JJ program_NN costing_VBG $_$ 1.7_CD trillion_CD between_IN 1990_CD and_CC 1994_CD ._.

Scenario_NN 1_CD ,_, known_VBN as_IN the_DT ``_`` Constant_JJ Dollar_NN Freeze_NN ,_, ''_'' reimburses_VBZ the_DT Pentagon_NNP for_IN inflation_NN only_RB --_: it_PRP slopes_VBZ upward_RB at_IN 4_CD %_NN per_IN year_NN ._.

This_DT can_MD be_VB thought_VBN of_IN as_IN a_DT pessimistic_JJ prediction_NN ,_, perhaps_RB driven_VBN by_IN the_DT sequestering_NN effects_NNS of_IN the_DT Gramm-Rudman_NNP deficit_NN reduction_NN law_NN or_CC possibly_RB a_DT relaxation_NN of_IN tensions_NNS with_IN the_DT Soviet_NNP Union_NNP ._.

This_DT exercise_NN would_MD reveal_VB the_DT true_JJ cost_NN of_IN a_DT particular_JJ program_NN by_IN forcing_VBG the_DT strategists_NNS to_TO make_VB hard_JJ decisions_NNS ._.
If_IN ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, they_PRP choose_VBP to_TO keep_VB the_DT B-2_NNP Stealth_NNP bomber_NN ,_, they_PRP would_MD have_VB to_TO sacrifice_VB more_JJR and_CC more_JJR other_JJ programs_NNS --_: such_JJ as_IN carrier_NN battlegroups_NNS or_CC army_NN divisions_NNS --_: as_IN they_PRP moved_VBD toward_IN lower_JJR budget_NN levels_NNS ._.
These_DT trade-offs_NNS would_MD evolve_VB priorities_NNS by_IN revealing_VBG when_WRB the_DT cost_NN of_IN the_DT B-2_NNP became_VBD prohibitive_JJ ._.

The_DT Securities_NNPS and_CC Futures_NNPS Commission_NNP ,_, a_DT government_NN watchdog_NN set_VBD up_RP after_IN the_DT 1987_CD crash_NN to_TO try_VB to_TO restore_VB confidence_NN and_CC order_NN to_TO Hong_NNP Kong_NNP 's_POS markets_NNS ,_, had_VBD been_VBN expected_VBN to_TO give_VB the_DT contract_NN conditional_JJ approval_NN last_JJ week_NN ._.
